plot: An American fashion designer is told that her husband has been killed in an air crash near France. However, she starts to believe that everything is not as it appears.
title: Illusions
plot_es: An American fashion designer is told that her husband has been killed in an air crash near France. However, she starts to believe that everything is not as it appears.
plot_en: An American fashion designer is told that her husband has been killed in an air crash near France. However, she starts to believe that everything is not as it appears.
